name: CRT World
description:
Adds a CRT & VCR overlay effect to your game!
You can change the settings of it in the remix menu.
Github here: https://github.com/ASlightlyOvergrownCactus/CRT-World 

Also adds a custom palette posturization shader!
Palette and shader are customized in remix.
For custom palette creation, check this guide: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1am2BCxo6lFmZx-iN2DjfYhh21Tz3HasLMkiOkdXf5Ao/edit?usp=sharing 

Note!!! This mod is incompatible with Sharpener!
